ENABLE_ZKAUTH_WALLET.description: Enable ZKAuth wallet creation and social login options

ENABLE_PRIVY_WALLET.description: Enable Privy wallet creation and social login options

ENABLE_SLIPPAGE_CUSTOMIZATION.description: Allow users to customize slippage tolerance in swap

ENABLE_TXN_DEADLINE_DISPLAY.description: Show transaction deadline setting in swap UI

ENABLE_MINIMUM_RECEIVED_DISPLAY.description: Show minimum received amount in swap review

ENABLE_PRICE_IMPACT_DISPLAY.description: Show price impact warning in swap

ENABLE_POOL_LIQUIDITY_DISPLAY.description: Show pool liquidity warnings in swap

FORCE_INTRO.description: Force intro flow even if already shown
